background_description: Solid pink background with a blurred heart shape
objects_description: Heart-shaped bubble tea container with black tapioca pearls at the bottom
caption:
idc if you’re single or taken, you deserve a little treat this valentine’s day 💗 our new, limited-time heart bottles are the absolute perfect way to manifest love for yourself or share the love with a special someone!! 🫶

order the heart bottle filled with your drink of choice for just $2 extra while supplies last!! 💘

background_description: Solid pink background with transparent heart shapes scattered around
objects_description: Two heart-shaped bottles with dark tapioca pearls at the bottom, labeled with a logo
text: Reminder love yourself & manifest positivity this month <3
caption:
the month of love has entered the chat!! 💕 we’re in our self-love era, which means manifesting all the joy, confidence, friendship, and dreams our hearts desire (plus lots of bubble tea) 🫶 what are you manifesting to show yourself love and self care this month?

starting on valentine’s day, february 14th, stop by your local gong cha to get a limited-edition heart-shaped bottle 💗🧋💫

background_description: Solid pink background with a slight shadow from the main objects
objects_description: Two plastic cups containing beverages—one with whipped cream and red drizzle on top, on a tan circular pedestal, and the other with a red straw
text: Strawberry Almond, STRAWBERRY ALMOND JELLY SMOOTHIE, Gong cha, STRAWBERRY ALMOND JELLY MILK TEA
caption:
She’s an icon, she’s a legend, and she is the moment 💅 We can’t stop dreaming about our new Strawberry Almond series!! 😍 Which are you dying to try first?? 🍓🧋💗

🍓 Strawberry Almond Jelly Smoothie | layers of almond jelly, strawberry jam and milk foam topped with a strawberry green tea smoothie blend

🥛 Strawberry Almond Jelly Milk Tea | iced strawberry milk tea poured over creamy almond jelly and strawberry jam, and topped with milk foam

Available now through February 29!! 🍓☁️

background_description: A smooth, plain surface with a neutral color
objects_description: A pair of hands holding a rectangular card with a graphic design related to a beverage
text: HAPPY NEW YEAR TEN ON TEN TEAHOUSE JAN. 2023
caption:
The Lunar New Year is coming🧧
Starting 2/5, we are giving out the Limited Red Envelope with random special coupons if you purchase two items in-store! The coupons include a free drink, buy one get one free, buy one get one 50% off, $1 off, and 20% off. Come with luck to get the biggest discount!

background_description: Pink background with Hello Kitty graphics and Tiger Sugar branding
objects_description: A collection of merchandise including drinks, a bobblehead, plush toys, and tote bags with Hello Kitty and Tiger Sugar branding
text: HELLO KITTY x TIGER SUGAR LIMITED-EDITION !!DON'T MISS OUT!!
caption:
Hold on to your boba, we're bringing you the cutest cup holders ever! Our limited-edition Hello Kitty cup holders are the perfect way to show your love of boba and @HelloKitty. Choose from a variety of colors and designs, all featuring your favorite Sanrio character.

But hurry, these cup holders are only available while supplies last! So what are you waiting for? Head to your nearest TIGER SUGAR and get your hands on these adorable cup holders today!

* To check availability, please contact your nearest Tiger Sugar store.

background_description: The picture has a plain, soft pink background that is uniformly colored.
objects_description: The focus is on several translucent pink boba pearls clustered together, some are blurred in the foreground and others are in sharp focus in the background.
text: PINK BOBA Water Chestnut Boba Signature Topping Applicable for all drinks
caption:
Bursting onto the Scene: Zero&’s new Pink Boba! 💗🧋
Elevate your drink experience with our newest topping! 🌸 These pink water chestnut boba pearls bring a surprising crunchy texture to every sip. Perfect for enhancing the freshness of our fruit drinks and complementing the rich tea flavors.

The combination of fresh, sweet, and crisp water chestnuts adds a unique twist to your favorite beverages. Try it today at Zero& stores and discover a whole new level of deliciousness!
bio:
🍵Reimagine Tea & Boba
0️⃣Calorie Sugar & More Real Fruits
📍Bay Area, SoCal, Boston
📱Download ZERO& app to get your first drink on us!
